name: vt-data-request
description: Represents a BACnet VT-Data request, used to send data to a virtual terminal session.

fields.name: vt-session-identifier
fields.description: The identifier of the VT session to which data is sent.

fields.name: vt-new-data
fields.description: The new data to be sent to the VT session.

fields.name: vt-data-flag
fields.description: Flag indicating if this is the final block of data (1) or not (0).
